subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. said Tuesday that Louisiana State committed major violations while recruiting a junior college player, placing the program on probation for a year and citing a former assistant coach for unethical conduct.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. said Tuesday that Louisiana State committed major violations while recruiting a junior college player, placing the program on probation for a year and citing a former assistant coach for unethical conduct.
